title: Gurman: Apple completes development of new external display, could be previewed alongside Mac mini on Tuesday
content:
As we’re almost 48 hours away from the first Apple event of the year, Bloomberg‘s Mark Gurman shares in his Power On newsletter that, alongside the iPhone SE 3 and iPad Air, the Cupertino company could be ready to launch a new Mac mini as well as preview a new external display.

more…

The post Gurman: Apple completes development of new external display, could be previewed alongside Mac mini on Tuesday appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Mark Gurman shares in his Power On newsletter that Apple could be ready to launch a new Mac mini as well as preview a new external display.
